42727.summary: Some customers in South Dryden are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
42727.title: Oct 7 – Dryden (South) | All Services - Outage (Fix in Progress)

live_updates: Services in the area have been restored. Thank you for your patience.
Tech crews are on site working towards a resolution.

42721.summary: Some customers in the Riversdale area of Saskatoon are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
42721.title: Oct 7 – Saskatoon (Riversdale) | All Services - Outage (Resolved)
